source.name: Box Recommendation
source.instructions: In order to make our code nicer. Rearrage the code below to make it produce the resulting image above.
source.initial:
def InBox(x):
  x=(["Movie Recommendations"]+x)
  biggest = max(x, key = len)
  biggest=len(biggest)
  print("+" + "-" * (biggest + 2) + "+")
  for i in x:
    print("| " + i + (" "*(biggest-len(i))) + " |")
    print("+" + "-" * (biggest + 2) + "+")
